Message of Sympathy to French Prime Minister
articles.content:
Message of Sympathy to French Prime Minister 
    Pyongyang, May 28 (KCNA) - Pak Pong Ju, premier of the DPRK Cabinet, sent a message of sympathy to Jean Pierre Raffarin, prime minister of France.
  The message said that upon hearing the sad news about an accident of a roof collapse at Paris Charles de Gaulle Airport on May 23 which claimed casualties, he extended deep consolation and sympathy to the prime minister and, through him, to the French government and all victims.
  It expressed the belief that the aftermath of the accident would be removed at an early date by the positive efforts of the French government.

articles.title: DPRK Delegations Leave to Attend International Meetings
articles.content:
DPRK Delegations Leave to Attend International Meetings
    Pyongyang, May 28 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Ministry of Railways led by Kim Yong Sam, minister of Railways, left here on May 28 by air to participate in the 32nd ministerial meeting of the Organization of Railways Cooperation to be held in Kishinyov, Moldova and another delegation led by Pak Jong Gun, vice-chairman of the State Panning Commission, to participate in an international conference on renewable energy to be held in Bonn, Germany.
